casebody.data:
Bruce J. TAYLOR, Appellant,
v.
Tracy COLIN, Respondent. WD 81228 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: June 18, 2019 Bruce J. Taylor, Appellant Pro Se. Tracy Colin, Respondent Pro Se. Before Division One: Victor C. Howard, Presiding Judge, Lisa White Hardwick, Judge and Gary D. Witt, Judge

ORDER

Per curiam:

Appellant Bruce Taylor appeals the judgment of the Circuit Court of Jackson County following a bench trial on a claim of breach of contract. On appeal Taylor alleges that the circuit court erred in disregarding evidence that, as a contractor, he must be paid in full for services rendered. For reasons explained more fully in a memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
